mapper.select: SELECT NAME, SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201901', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '01월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201902', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '02월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201903', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '03월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201904', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '04월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201905', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '05월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201906', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '06월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201907', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '07월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201908', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '08월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201909', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '09월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201910', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '10월', SUM(if(SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) = '201911', OFFER_VAL, NULL)) AS '11월' FROM OFFER WHERE OFFER_TYP = 1 GROUP BY NAME;
SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) OFFER_DTM_YM FROM OFFER WHERE SUBSTR(OFFER_DTM,1,6) BETWEEN #{startYM} AND #{endYM}
SELECT OFFER_TYP_CD, OFFER_TYP_NAME, CH_NO, length(OFFER_TYP_NAME) OFFER_TYP_NAME_LENGTH FROM OFFER_TYP WHERE CH_NO = #{ch_no}

SELECT SEQ, MEMBER_NO, CH_NO, STR_TO_DATE(INPUT_DTM, '%Y%m%d') INPUT_DTM, STR_TO_DATE(MOD_DTM, '%Y%m%d') MOD_DTM, WEEK_NUM, OFFER_VAL, NAME, STR_TO_DATE(OFFER_DTM, '%Y%m%d') OFFER_DTM, (SELECT OFFER_TYP_NAME FROM OFFER_TYP WHERE CH_NO = O.CH_NO AND OFFER_TYP_CD = O.OFFER_TYP_CD) OFFER_TYP_CD FROM OFFER O WHERE O.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND O.CH_NO = #{ch_no}
